steps.plaintext: Search for the ward at the Serpent's Head

substeps.plaintext: Follow the elemental trace into a hole.
substeps.markdown: Follow the elemental trace into a hole.

substeps.plaintext: Before jumping inside the hole, summon Electrograna.
substeps.markdown: Before jumping inside the hole, summon Electrograna.

substeps.plaintext: Jump in and deactivate the barrier while activating the mechanism to lower the water.
substeps.markdown: Jump in and deactivate the barrier while activating the mechanism to lower the water.

substeps.plaintext: Defeat 3 Ruin Destroyers, then 6 Hydro Slimes
Retrieve the Serpent's Head: Rock Pillar Warding Stone before the waterfall
substeps.markdown: Retrieve the ◀Serpent's Head: Rock Pillar Warding Stone▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Serpent%27s_Head:_Rock_Pillar_Warding_Stone▷ before the waterfall

substeps.plaintext: Note: This is the same location for The Gourmet Supremos: The Deep Divers quest.
substeps.markdown: Note: This is the same location for ◀The Gourmet Supremos: The Deep Divers▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Gourmet_Supremos:_The_Deep_Divers▷ quest.

substeps.plaintext: Follow the elemental trace to a Sacred Stone Puzzle on the body of water between Higi Village and Serpent's Head.
substeps.markdown: Follow the elemental trace to a ◀Sacred Stone Puzzle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sacred_Stone_Puzzle▷ on the body of water between ◀Higi Village▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Higi_Village▷ and ◀Serpent's Head▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Serpent%27s_Head▷.

substeps.plaintext: Solve the puzzle (see below for solution)
substeps.markdown: Solve the puzzle (◀see below for solution▶◁#Sacred_Stone_Puzzle▷)

substeps.plaintext: Retrieve the Serpent's Head: Rock Pillar Pearl
Submit the two items to the ward.
substeps.markdown: Submit the two items to the ward.
